website_summaries.verdict: Add an element of humor to any wedding cake with this unique cake topper.
pros: Humors partner-in-crime design will be a talking point for all your guests
Lightweight porcelain topper is ideal for any size cake
Can be kept as a keepsake
cons: Porcelain is delicate and breaks easily when dropped

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as figurine or as cake topper. Custom hair avail
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cake topper for my daughter’s castle wedding cake. Beautiful and unique and fit the couple very well. They cut the cake with a 3 foot sword and the whole thing was a huge hit. Our original cake topper fell through two days before the wedding, I ordered this and had it shipped overnight from Amazon, it arrived on time, and I was thrilled. We did not have time to order the customer hair color version, so my daughter painted the hair to match the couple and it turned out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Apprentice 2

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I guess my headline makes it sounds like mine got broken, but no that did not happen. But we were very careful with it. This is not plastic so it is very fragile and can break so I hope anyone that buys it makes sure that it did not get broken in shipping, then puts it back up somewhere safe until their big special day. It looks just like the pic. Got me and my husband quite a lot of laughs cause of them holding each others butts lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cazbaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Got my item today and I was definitely pleased. Maybe it was just me but it was a bit lighter than expected but the design and style makes up for it. The detail on the couple are great and I would definitely recommend to other couples
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to put this topper on our wedding cake ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to put this topper on our wedding cake! For $20 to have a unique collectible that we'll cherish forever, you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle White

customer_reviews.title: Best cake topper.
customer_reviews.text: This was a little expensive but I had to have it! It was like a mullet business in the front and party in the back. I love how sophisticated the front looked and my guests got a kick out of it when I turned it around and we were grabbing each others rears. It’s constructed well and the hand painting is great. I wanted a funny cake topper and this worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely!
customer_reviews.text: After scouring the internet and recovering from the sticker shock on seeing the cost of cake toppers, I found this lovely, fine porcelain topper on Amazon for a fraction of the price of other websites. It will be perfect for my two-sided wedding cake, which will have one side decorated as a football field with groom carrying the bride into the end zone on the top tier. The detailing is very nice, even down to the tiny diamond on her finger and delicate bouquet she is holding. I can't wait for my fiance to see it on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cake topper. I improvised.. wanted to include Crystal Initial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice & Made of Porcelain
customer_reviews.text: We just got married a few weeks ago and chose this for our wedding cake topper. It is super high quality, proportions of the figures look right and it's made of porcelain versus plastic of some sort. Something that will last and something we will be proud to keep. Good color and painting of the figures. We were very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Land Shark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper!!!! First date at the shooting range!
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely, perfect for my cake for my upcoming wedding. The little car is bought separate. I thought it's cute with a get away car, lol. And also, our first date was in a shooting range! So, this is just right!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Not African American plus No return policy on item
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is no where close to being African American what a waste of money was planning to use it for my wedding but that’s a NO go tried to return the item there is a no return policy so I’m stuck with a Caucasian wedding topper very irritated do not waste your money or time ordering this item
customer_reviews.author: Budget friendly

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would be a good product with all of the other positive reviews, but wow! This is super high quality and you cannot beat it for the cost. Would buy it again without a doubt. It will be perfect for our big day!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Classy, but funny
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our wedding cake after seeing a friend who had it at her wedding. My husband is a professional shooter, so it really added a bit of our personalities to the cake. it is the perfect size! It was on a 3 tier cake, and looked perfect. The only draw back is that there are no other hair colors to choose from. However, you can change it yourself with a small paint brush and paint, if you want them to look like you.
customer_reviews.author: Hwansik Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful keepsake
customer_reviews.text: This turned out beautiful and will definitely be a keepsake for our wedding day. Shipping was fast, packaged excellently which kept it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Texas mom

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: if you didn't know it would look totally normal but as my husband and I are always doing this it was perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this. The detail is beautiful. I was looking for something unique and went through hundreds of either the same old thing, or over the top cake toppers. I did use streamline markers to change the hair color then lightly sprayed with lacquer to seal it. My fiance' collects antique cars, so this was the perfect couple for us!! *** Delivered in one day!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindred Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cake topper. Its lightweight and the colors are exactly as the picture shows them. I did receive mine with the grooms right hand partially broken, but I don't have time to return it and luckily it won't show when the topper is on the cake and isn't very noticeable unless you look for it. My Marine asked if I could get his rank on the arm and I ended up having a red paint (Anita's All Purpose Acrylic Craft Paint in 11020 Dark Red) that matched what was already used and painted it on there myself. The gold I used is forlkart Metallic in 676E Inca Gold, which I found at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: EmSearles

customer_reviews.title: Friend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit pricey, but my friend absolutely loved it for her wedding. There is not a lot of options for military wedding cake toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my sons wedding..lovely bi-racial cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Not much to pick from, the topper is beautifully made and will look wonderful on the wedding cake
customer_reviews.author: Pwildcon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like depicted, delivered efficiently. I purchased this for my future wedding. It was so beautiful I had to purchase it now and keep it safely. Love the fact that it resembles my boyfriend and I, compared to many other cake toppers out there. Can't wait to use it, hopefully one day soon. Love the email correspondence with the company!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaneealfred

customer_reviews.title: Great representation
customer_reviews.text: Used as my wedding cake topper. It’s hard to find figures that represent how my husband and I look. Great for a display in the home too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! Fun cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cake topper. (Sexy spy) can’t wait to put it on our cake! It is beautiful quality, and has a nice bit a weight to it. It can be used as a decoration at your house after the wedding. Will not go to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress enough that this looked so much better in person. We're really happy we chose this as our cake topper. It's the perfect combination of traditional and cheeky. Plus the quality was very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Well Packed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well painted. Bigger than expected, heavy, packaged really well. Arrived wrapped in a plastic bag, boxed by foam, writhing a cardboard box. Has nice textures, too. No complaints at all. The little flower is a little sharp though, and obviously the figure is fragile, so keep out of reach from children or away from clumsy people.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I used as my cake topper on my wedding cake, and it was super cute! My husband and I both loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not too heave material
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, not too heave material. The little diamond ring on brides hand add a nice touch. Also the grrom has a ring on his finger as well, you can't really see it on pictures here. Perfect height as well. Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Karina L.

customer_reviews.title: Beach Get Away Wedding Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I searched a lot of websites looking for an elegant wedding topper for a small family celebration. This topper was what I was looking for that most closely represented the couple with the exception of the bride's hair color. Most toppers had blonde brides, so I bought dark brown ceramic paint and repainted the hair on the bride. It was perfect for the couple and the situation. Delicate and detailed, this topper will make a special keepsake. Ordering from Amazon also saved nearly $15 over the few other sites that I found with this particular topper.
customer_reviews.author: bpcnak

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Reception
customer_reviews.text: This was the only interracial cake topper I could find, and it was beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Kurtina Rubio

customer_reviews.title: I really liked how it came quickly and that it was quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how it came quickly and that it was quality made. I really liked the detailed work. I really liked the ring detail on the bride with intimate touch. I would have liked to have seen more available skin color shades for brown for both the bride and groom to make it more realistic but for the price it was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Proctor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find the perfect cake topper. But had to purchase 2. The first one barely bumped a glass a broke. I wanted to keep it a a souvenir. So had to purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Vendolyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters wedding recently and it was a big hit!The quality is spot on and its not so heavy,or too light as to create a problem standing it on the cake.From the front it is very elegant,butt from behind its loans an element of the not crude humour that is sometimes needed after the ceremony.the detail is very nice also.Great value for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: It's lovely but
customer_reviews.text: The gentleman's lips look really weird. But I can fix it with some paint.
customer_reviews.author: Ranalis

customer_reviews.title: ... in two weeks and this is going to be perfect on the cake
customer_reviews.text: My wedding is in two weeks and this is going to be perfect on the cake. The painting is very nice and is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for wedding
customer_reviews.text: Only a few knew what this topper was doing. Great fun. Photographer loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Caggiano-cuevas

customer_reviews.title: The best cake topper for love
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cute cake topper! This will also be added to the house decor after the wedding. It is a sweet and behind the scene look at how we roll!! lol
customer_reviews.author: PATTI HARRELL

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely couple. I added veil in tulle. Perfect for cake topper! Even my son, groom, loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Unique topper
customer_reviews.text: Husband really liked this one. I love the attention to detail on this. Very neat for a topper that's unique! We tested this on a cake already and it's well balanced with just the right amount of weight to it. We are doing fondant with it, so the topper is pretty easy to put in place.
customer_reviews.author: Rowbee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our upcoming wedding, and am so pleased with the purchase. It is a beautiful piece, and like the other people said in their reviews, which I always read before buying off Amazon, we, too, will be holding onto it as a precious keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is extremely beautiful and I would strongly recommend it to any bride and groom. Like the best keepsakes it is fragile and doesn't hold up well when knocked over on the counter. I lost my leg and my bride lost her head. So learn from our mistake and buy two... one for the cake and one to put away for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on my cake topper. I am so pleased with the outcome. This was literally the only place to find decent looking interracial couple. I had a sugar flower under her feet so the space wasn't empty.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully crafted
customer_reviews.text: We used this cake topper and LOVED IT. It still sits on the Mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Trent

customer_reviews.title: This is really pretty. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty. Well made. I purchased it as a gift for a friend's wedding. It was not used as a cake topper, but a keepsake. I was very happy with the quality of the statue.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pacitto

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wedding cake topper of a dancing couple. Love the price, really nice porcelain material.
customer_reviews.author: Karis A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Center Piece
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this center piece for my sisters wedding as a surprise. She and my brother in law loved it. It was beautiful in every way. Their cake got so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: TheOneSheIs

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find a Farscape Scorpius, so this was the next best thing! ;)
customer_reviews.text: This was our wedding cake topper! It was sooooooooo cute and people really loved it. We are Farscape fans, and at first had joked about putting a Scorpius and John on our cake, but figured that would REALLY confuse the older attendees, like the grandparents. Then I wanted a replica Stargate, but we are not rich. This gave the right combination of fun, understandable by all audiences, and inexpensive! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Catazon :)

customer_reviews.title: wonderful precision of details
customer_reviews.text: I adore this figurine, it's much higher than most of them, wonderful precision of details, especially faces, very well drawn. We ordered 3 different cake toppers for our wedding cakes, this one costs more than others, but it's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wanted this for on top of her wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for on top of her wedding cake. It looked soo cute sitting on top. The guests laughed when they saw the pinching bride and groom. It put a smile on everyones faces. I only wish the bride and groom were on top of a base. (They are not) Because they did fall over and the grooms head broke off. We had to make an emergency fix it job.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wedding cake. It arrived in perfect condition and is very pretty. We received many compliments on it. It is exactly as pictured. I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone looking for a pretty cake topper that is beach themed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful Detail
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, fun and definitely eye catching! It’s going to look great on our 007 cake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Item I purchased for my wedding.
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Can't wait to see it on our wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that I could cherish forever, and this is just that! Craftmanship and packaging 100/100
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Meerbeek

customer_reviews.title: was well boxed and in perfect condition. I ordered it for my daughter's wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: The topper arrived much faster than expected, was well boxed and in perfect condition. I ordered it for my daughter's wedding next month. She absolutely loves it! It is very light - which is perfect for a cake topper. There is no base but we are hoping it will not be a problem. Very pleased with the topper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I received it without delay. It is a stunning piece. Thank you for such an awesome item.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I expected when I ordered it. It is also fairly durable. We flew with it to and from Hawaii in checked bags and it didn’t break. It’s a great cake topper!
customer_reviews.author: XFitLauren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look cheap and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a cake topper that looked good and didnt look cheap. This topper was one of the best I have found and it is heavy than what it looks. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: nolan jackson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. Was packaged nicely
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Was packaged nicely, faces look good not smudged or odd looking. Will not be disappointed if you buy. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wedding cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wedding cake topper. It was beautiful. It’s hard to find a nice topper for a black/mixed male & white female. Unfortunately, it broke after it was placed on my cake. Still beautiful, wish I could of kept it whole
customer_reviews.author: MrsVerrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect topper for a perfect wedding
customer_reviews.text: With my last name being Bond, my wife and I decided to make it a theme. Our Bond themed reception was a lot of fun and we got several compliments on this cake topper. It really helped to tie the theme together. It's well made and painted nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bond

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I am a black woman and had a hard time finding an interracial couple with a latino man. Because of the material, this was very easy to paint and it still looks stunning. Im giving it 5 stars because it worked for me but for the average black woman, these cake toppers are very light-skinned to that of a mixed person. Nonetheless, good price 0.50 paint at Walmart... let's just say I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Arrived today. Couldn't be happier. Only thing... Wish was in beginning of description, that hair color CAN be custom. But, a lil porcelain pain..no problem. ( I should have read more. Lol)
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I met as new dancers and after 4 years, that is our hobby of choice. This cake topper was perfect for what we wanted, the quality was perfect and it came in a nice box to keep as a keepsake. I packed it into our Anniversay Box to use it on the cake again for our 1 year anniversary, along with a supply of the reception decorations to recreate the scene when we celebrate. Nice idea, huh? :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping / not 100% perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Friday evening and it was delivered Sunday morning with basic shipping ! I couldn't believe it. And I love it, there are some imperfections on the piece but for the price and fast delivery I'm definitely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it.... super cute just what I was looking for..does not look cheap. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great seller....wants to make sure item was exactly what I wanted....and it was! Beautiful and actually better than expected quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Lee Kuietauskas-Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Fast and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cake topper and it came within a couple days. We ordered a different cake topper before this one and the paint was awful. The painting in this was is great! And the paint is glossy. The package it came in was a box and then there was another little box that the topper was in and it had styrofoam around the bottom part of it so it made the delivery to us without breaking! So happy with this cake topper
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very cool - totally us, but too big for our cake
customer_reviews.text: The top tier of our cake was 6", so I think this was a bit big for it, but still the best topper I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Cramzula

customer_reviews.title: Less Vivid
customer_reviews.text: Hair color is dull in person compared to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Best cake topper
customer_reviews.text: I love this cake topper. It really expresses our relationship. Perfect quality and great buy.
customer_reviews.author: mike cushman

customer_reviews.title: very well details pretty face
customer_reviews.text: I just this as a cake topper I like that I can paint it with acrylic paint
customer_reviews.author: lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration but needs work
customer_reviews.text: My cake lady couldn’t get it to stay on the cake tried everything She could, it wasn’t possible but it’s a nice little addition
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bride & Groom
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! The bride & groom both love them! This product seems to be made with care and will hopefully leave a lasting memory from their blessed day!
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! Can't wait to see it on our wedding cake. It is beautifully crafted and real quality.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and funny, looked great on top of my wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: scaress123

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size and came well protected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! They are the perfect size and came well protected!
customer_reviews.author: Ger

customer_reviews.title: Gotta add the blood, but i still love it :)
customer_reviews.text: I received this item 3 days after I purchased it. Admittedly I forgot to check the size, but it's about as big as my hand. Its very nice and has a bit of weight to it. You do have the option of customizing hair color, I didnt, but you can. The only complaint I have is that the male looks incredibly thin. Otherwise, great topper for a zombie survivalist wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Godiva

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Topper
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as depicted in the photo. Arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cake topper.
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like what's in the product page and I love the way it looks. It has a good weight to it, but not too heavy and is very sturdy. This won't be breaking on my any time soon. Comes in a box with styrofoam cutout in the shape of the topper so it doesn't break during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Cake Topping even got a wedding picture posed same way
customer_reviews.text: Fun and unique wedding cake topper even got a wedding picture posed same way.
customer_reviews.author: Weezy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday gift for my future wife! Also to be used at our wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Salond22

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cake topper
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a cake topper that depicted our relationship and this one is perfect!! I love it! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  Cake Topper!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cake topper! So me and my husband! Quality was great!
customer_reviews.author: October Rooney

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy - but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A little bit heavier than I thought, but it looks beautiful! With hardly any interracial options on the market I’m glad we found this one. Also, we may purchase a small little white tray to put underneath so it doesn’t fall through the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Shanele Changoo

customer_reviews.title: Did a wonderful job in shipping properly
customer_reviews.text: Did a wonderful job in shipping properly. The figurine had its own Styrofoam box that made it convenient in brining it to and from the venue without breaking. The item was pictured and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jbliles

customer_reviews.title: Skin color in the Amazon.com photo is NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: Skin color is super inaccurate in the Amazon.com photo. The groom is as white as a sheet, and the bride very dark. It is a beautiful topper, but just understand that it looks really different from the pic on Amazon. There REALLY needs to be a Hispanic couple version of this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: she & her husband loved it (it's on their mantel now)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our daughter's wedding cake...she & her husband loved it (it's on their mantel now)
customer_reviews.author: cmesign4u

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It looks super pretty, easy to wash, its very light.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver D.

customer_reviews.title: It has great detail, beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: The cake topper came in on time. It has great detail, beautifully made. I will be ordering more from Wedding Collectibles. I believe they are a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed with the quality. It comes very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: BriWigle

customer_reviews.title: SO ADORABLE AND SO "US"!
customer_reviews.text: This was just too perfect for me to pass up! It immediately reminded me of my fiance and i just had to buy it. He loves it too, and while it's probably not going to be the topper for my actual wedding cake, we're definitely finding a place for it in our wedding set-up. The details on this cake topper are incredible and it's definitely made with quality materials and a lot of care and love.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This topper was amazing, It was the perfect topper for my brothers ...
customer_reviews.text: This topper was amazing, It was the perfect topper for my brothers wedding. I love'd the detail of it and it was made of ceramic but it didn't weight the cake down. Simply amazing
customer_reviews.author: patreca mcreynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun little people for cake
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!!! Looks somewhat traditional in the front and made every laugh when they saw the back! We used it for a bachelorette party and it added a bit of fun to the celebration! It’s actually nicely made too.
customer_reviews.author: LifeExtended

customer_reviews.title: Fun cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Loved the topper - one small leaf in the bouquet fell off when we unwrapped it but you could not tell that it was missing so we pressed onward! very beautiful and fun. Bride was happy to take it home when the cake was done!
customer_reviews.author: Chele Chilli

customer_reviews.title: Very lifelike
customer_reviews.text: The detail surprised us. It is really a perfect cake topper. Very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Sola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute wedding Cake topper and we got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jennings

customer_reviews.title: So cute, just made the wedding cake table! ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute, just made the wedding cake table! Bride had already purchased a cake topper, but since the reception was held in their barn it was darling on the table with the knives and grooms cake.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Y.

customer_reviews.title: It MADE the Wedding Cake!!!
customer_reviews.text: When my wife and I were picking out cake toppers, we wanted to have something different...and fun. In our case, this was the perfect topper. It looked GREAT on our cake and EVERYONE commented on how fun it was. Let's face it...a wedding is supposed to be fun and this MADE the cake! You won't be disappointed by the quality of the topper or by how it looks on your cake! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Lovin the rainbow of Black beautiful skin of the wedding cake toppers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the cake toppers products not just because they are Afrocentric, but because they represent the many beautiful hues of Black skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila L. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantasy Fairy Bride and Groom Wedding Cake Top Topper Figurine
customer_reviews.text: Fantasy Fairy Bride and Groom Wedding Cake Top Topper Figurine ; cost vs quality is great. this is ceramic and not plastic. It has some weight to it and I would not put it on a small soft cake, lol. I went looking for a dragon and a fairy, but this worked out just fine. Wife is happy so i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: oshirenshi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for a topper that "matched" us! Was delivered 3 days earlier than expected. Figures are very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! As soon as I saw it I knew I needed it for my upcoming wedding. Both my soon to be husband and I are avid shooters and love the idea that we can display our love in a unique way. The product has nice details and seems to be of good quality material. Can't wait to see the reaction we get on our wedding day!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Love this but hair is lighter than pictures
customer_reviews.text: My groom and I couldn't agree on any cake toppers until we came across this James Bond-esque super spy. It's a fun addition to our geeky wedding reception. My only complaint is that the bride's hair looks more brown in the pictures. It is more of a blonde on the actual topper.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

product_meta.title: Wedding Collectibles Super Sexy Spy Guns Wedding Cake Topper with Bride and Groom | Fun, Sexy, Humorous Figurine | Fine Porcelain | 5.5 Inches
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Super Sexy Spy Guns Wedding Cake Topper with Bride and Groom

Add a little sassy fun and excitement to your wedding cake with a, sexy cake topper by Wedding Collectibles. 

Make it a Memorable Event 

Are you different than most couples? Looking to put a little fun and sexiness into your cake topper? Then you need the Wedding Collectibles Super Sexy Spy Guns Bride and Groom ; a cute, hand-painted cake topper made of beautiful porcelain that’s funny, adorable, and shows you there’s a lot more to your marriage than people will ever know! 

Weddings, Bridal Showers, and Bachelorette Parties 

This one-of-a-kind cake topper looks great on all your party and event cakes surrounding your big day, and it also makes for a wonderful keepsake that you’ll remember forever. Don’t be like everyone else and do the traditional hearts, holding hands, or taking vows; get the sexy bride and groom and put a smile on your friends’ and families’ faces. 

Product Details:

 * Sexy Spy Guns Bride and Groom Wedding Cake Topper 
 * Fine Porcelain 
 * Intricate Details 
 *  Crystal Wedding Ring on Bride
 * Dimensions: 5.5” x 2.5” 
 * Weight: 0.3 lbs. 
 * Cake Topper Design By Wedding Collectibles

Click ‘Add to Cart’ to get this hilarious and memorable wedding cake topper perfect for your special day.
feature_bullets: Wonderful Keepsake – A great memento for new married couples, this is one more way you can have your wedding and special moment stand out. Hilarious Bride/Groom Combo – This fun bride is with her gun at the ready with her soon-to-be husband.
Height: 5.5" - Weight: 0.3 lbs - Base Diameter: 2.5" - Ideal Cake Topper Size - Bride and her groom are lightweight and sized to fit all cakes

Premium Craftsmanship – The original cake topper of this design, it’s crafted with high-quality fine porcelain and intricate details for a beautiful look. Made of Fine Porcelain - Crystal Wedding Ring on Bride
Order with Custom Hair Color here: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00XLU4EG2
